com.ericbarnhill.jvcl

Class JVCLUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericbarnhill.jvcl.JVCLUtils

  • public class JVCLUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This collection of static utility methods contains several methods called by the convolution classes, and several methods that may be convenient for the convolution calls of users. More documentation of these methods can be added on request.

        public static float[] shiftVectorDim(float[] image,
                                     int width)
        Flips dimensions of 2D image without leaving 1D representation
        Parameters:
        image - float[] vectorised image
        width - int first depth level dimension
        Returns:
        float[] with dimensions swapped
